title: Matchmaking more than unbalance
body:
lol Fuck beginers dirty in the ass. This matchmaking is more than shit. I was just angry after the last five game as i played with my beginer buddy lvl 20 with 74 wins. Just  last games our team lvl 30 silver II, lvl 30 unranked, lvl 20 beginner. Enemy team lvl 30 Platinum III, lvl 30 Gold 2, lvl 30 Silver V. 
This is just a joke.

replies.body:
1. German forum.
2. Kein Wunder, wenn du mit deinem Main aus mit ihm spielst. Hast selber gehofft, schwächere Spieler bashen zu können, stattdessen wirst du gebashed, was?
